From: KSLawdogg@...

(I'm still BRB, so no one IM me, mkay?  Big, big fight in a MUSH)

The Oblitercons:




Dark One had his laser rifle ready, but was more ready to transform to his 
jet fighter mode if anything got dicey.  "My team and I are ready, Wolfgang."

Mortar took out his grenade launcher from subspace, looking around and 
preparing.

Pyro was still unarmed, but was simply ready to transform to tank mode if 
needed.  "Let's burn some losers."

Hiss remained quite, simply brandishing his fusion cannon which was at half 
power and slowly charging to full.

Scrounge, still grumbling about his new name, had his chain gun ready, making 
his way towards Dark One to complain again.
